name: Zucchini Corn Radish Salad
description: This Zucchini Corn Radish Salad is a perfect blend of flavors and textures, tailored for those following a healthy lifestyle. With its low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar ingredients, it's an ideal choice for a nutritious and refreshing meal. Whether you're looking for a healthy recipe to add to your collection or seeking to maintain a balanced diet, this salad is a delightful choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the vegetables: Slice 1 medium zucchini, cut the kernels off 1 ear of corn, and thinly slice 50g of raw Daikon radish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, melt 3 tsp of butter over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the corn kernels to the pan and sauté for about 5 minutes, until slightly softened and golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in 0.25 tsp of virgin coconut oil with the corn and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the sautéed corn, sliced zucchini, sliced radish, and 0.50 cup of chopped red onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the salad with 1 Tbsp of cane vinegar, gently toss to combine all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
